title: Jessye Norman Sings Carmen
creator_credit: Peter Gelb, Susan Froemke, Zweites Deutsches Fernsehen, Radio France, Philips Classics, Nederlandse Omroep Stichting, La Sept, BBC and Antenne-2
brief_description: Featuring highlights from the Philips Classics/Radio France recording of Bizet’s “Carmen”, with Jessye Norman (Carmen), Neil Shicoff (Don Jose), Simon Estes (Escamillo), Radio Chorus France, and National Orchestra of France. Filmed by Albert Maysles and Martin Schaer.
